CustomField.description: Survey Question 10. Reference and Waiver - American Technologies, Inc. may use me as a reference and I authorize them to use the contents of this survey in advertising, promotional materials, and references. I further authorize ATI to use and publish my name, company (if applicable), city, and state in connection with this survey.
